text: Galimard in Eze Galimard is the first French perfume creator/manufacturer and based in Grasse. Founded in 1747, it is the third-oldest perfume company in the world. == History == In 1747 Jean de Galimard, Lord of Seranon founded the perfumery in Grasse.
